channel.title: Adding custom ranks and making commands.java and commands.class
channel.description:
hello,
im new in coding and i have a question. how can i add custom ranks like advertiser, helper or veteran?
if someone can help me please
Gold blade
PS: im using a 317 delta source
and the other thing
alot of sources have a file called ''commands.java and commands.class'' how can i make those into me source??

item.title: Adding custom ranks and making commands.java and commands.class
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

gold blade:

yeah but i dont really understand it :S

You have to rip your commands out of the delta client.java, and then put them into a new class (.java file) and make it read through the client.java

Or you could just find one of the 10 prepackaged delta’s I’ve seen some of the community develop.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom ranks and making commands.java and commands.class

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“gold blade, post:5, topic:522202”]ok…

but problem is i wanna make something for a rsps not a bisycle[/quote]oh dear lord…

that was just an example of how to make a class I was expecting you to design your own commands class with commands. :eek:
